text:
Company: Anderson and Sons

Job Title: Staff Product Manager - Portal and Collaboration Solutions

About Us:
Anderson and Sons is a leading provider of innovative technology solutions. We believe that diversity drives innovation and success, and we're dedicated to fostering an inclusive culture where everyone can thrive.

Job Description:
We're seeking an experienced Staff Product Manager to lead our Portal and Collaboration Solutions team. As a product expert, you will be responsible for developing and executing product strategies that meet our customers' needs.

Responsibilities:

- Define product vision and roadmap, aligning with company goals and objectives
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and launch new products and features
- Analyze market trends, customer needs, and competitor activity to inform product decisions
- Develop business cases and financial models to support product initiatives
- Communicate product plans and results to stakeholders, including executive leadership and customers

Qualifications:

- 5+ years of product management experience, with a focus on portal and collaboration solutions
- Strong understanding of technology trends and their application in business environments
- Excellent communication, collaboration, and project management skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities
- Fluency in English; knowledge of additional languages is a plus

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for career growth and professional development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible work arrangements, including remote work options
